viktor_novikov.name: Instant Bathroom
viktor_novikov.notes: Get him sick before he has moved a couple steps down to have him go alone or alternatively let him to have his bodyguard (Kurt) with him.

viktor_novikov.name: Downstairs Fireworks
viktor_novikov.notes: Pay attention to the timings I try to display in the video, there is a deadzone for Vik where he will go the wrong way.

viktor_novikov.name: Tech Corridor
viktor_novikov.notes: Pick up remote detonate ASAP *or delay him with a distraction shot

viktor_novikov.name: Fireworks Outside
viktor_novikov.notes: Instant Fireworks will have Vik arrive outside around 1 minute later on his own. Small window here to KO or kill and drag

viktor_novikov.name: Ceiling Shot - Tech
viktor_novikov.notes: Shoot at the very top of the wall ASAP to get Viktor investigate the attic, arrive at the attic entrance around 90s later to isolate

viktor_novikov.name: Ceiling Shot - Attic
viktor_novikov.notes: Shoot at the very top of the wall ASAP to get Viktor investigate the attic, arrive at the attic entrance around 90s later to isolate

viktor_novikov.name: Emetic Wallbang
viktor_novikov.notes: Make Viktor sick through the stairs and make your way around the mansion to the above floor. Faster route up to Vik here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=89xiIaeu8b0

viktor_novikov.name: Fireworks Seiker
viktor_novikov.notes: Instant activate fireworks then seiker him at any point. His sickness will activate once the firework sequence ends and then he will puke in floor 1 bathroom at around 2:30.

viktor_novikov.name: Tech Instant Distract
viktor_novikov.notes: Dont activate fireworks, instead distract Viktor. Don't go too fast or you will clip the camera

viktor_novikov.name: Seikerless Attic
viktor_novikov.notes: Distract the guard by Viktor and then Viktor

dalia_margolis.name: IAGO Bathroom
dalia_margolis.notes: Drop emetic device from your inventory at Dalia's Feet ASAP, avoid anyone else. The Tech video shows how to enter this bathroom faster and get a disguise. https://youtu.be/-ZYlwAqyqyI

dalia_margolis.name: Fireworks Balcony
dalia_margolis.notes: Activate fireworks then access the top balcony via pipe or disguise. Then shut the door and double KO

dalia_margolis.name: Fireworks Down 1
dalia_margolis.notes: Activate fireworks then when she is out on the balcony distract her guard then throw lure her down.

dalia_margolis.name: Fireworks Double Down
dalia_margolis.notes: Activate fireworks then when she is out on the balcony distract her guard then KO the security guard and ring the phone.

dalia_margolis.name: Suite
dalia_margolis.notes: Peekaboo or sieker her into the bathroom and KO.

dalia_margolis.name: Code 17
dalia_margolis.notes: KO Kurt (Vik's bodyguard) for his phone and activate it for "Code 17" lockdown. 90s later dalia is isolated.
